se350.afifsohaili.gameframework

Interface UserInterface


  • public interface UserInterface
    This interface provides the method signatures that are used by Mechanics class to start the game and update the UserInterface. Apart from that, it also defines how the game should exit or display error messages if an error is encountered.
    Author:
    Afif Sohaili

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void displayError(String errorMsg)
      Used to display error messages to users.
      void exit()
      Defines how the game exit.
      void run(Mechanics mechanics)
      Starts the game.
      void updateUI(String[][] data)
      Allows the UserInterface to be updated.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        void run(Mechanics mechanics)
        Starts the game.
        Parameters:
        mechanics - the game mechanics. Sometimes, starting the game require some methods from the Mechanics class. e.g. Mechanics.getHorizontalTiles()
        See Also:
        Mechanics

      • updateUI

        void updateUI(String[][] data)
        Allows the UserInterface to be updated.
        Parameters:
        data - contains the data. The method should process the given data and updates the UserInterface accordingly.

      • displayError

        void displayError(String errorMsg)
        Used to display error messages to users.
        Parameters:
        errorMsg - the error message.

      • exit

        void exit()
        Defines how the game exit.
